intro: Astronia confertiflora, commonly known as the denseflower astronia, is a flowering plant native to tropical regions of South America. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae, which includes many shrubs and small trees. The plant is characterized by its compound leaves and clusters of small, white to pale yellow flowers. It thrives in humid, shaded environments and is often found in forest understories. Astronia confertiflora is valued for its ornamental appeal and ecological role in supporting local biodiversity.
